sentences.english: and burned fragrant incense on it, as the Lord commanded him.
sentences.chinese: 在壇上燒了麝香料做的香，是照耶和華所吩咐他的。

sentences.english: Joshua therefore commanded the priests, saying, Come ye up out of Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 你吩咐擡法櫃的祭司從約旦河裏上來。

sentences.english: Therefore the LORD your God has commanded you to observe the Sabbath day.
sentences.chinese: 因此，耶和華你的神吩咐你守安息日。

sentences.english: Then King David said, 'Call in Bathsheba.'
sentences.chinese: 大衛王吩咐說，叫拔示巴來。

sentences.english: Why should Horus now do as the Emperor bids?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼何魯斯現在還要聽從帝皇的吩咐？

sentences.english: On that night could not the king sleep, and he commanded to bring the book of records of the chronicles; and they were read before the king.
sentences.chinese: 那夜王睡不着覺，就吩咐人取歷史來，念給他聽。

sentences.english: 27So he immediately sent an executioner with orders to bring John's head. The man went, beheaded John in the prison
sentences.chinese: 隨即差一個護衛兵，吩咐拿約翰的頭來。

sentences.english: He was told not to tread the earth round the roots of the seedling.
sentences.chinese: 他被吩咐不可把樹苗根部周圍的土踩硬。

sentences.english: Have you eaten from the tree that I commanded you not to eat from?
sentences.chinese: 莫非你吃了我吩咐你不可喫的那樹上的果子嗎？

sentences.english: Samuel was asked by God to anoint Saul and later David as Kings of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 神吩咐撒母耳膏掃羅和大衛爲以色列的王。

sentences.english: What is required in the first commandment?
sentences.chinese: 第一誡命吩咐我們作什麼？

sentences.english: He shall give orders, and they shall wash that part wherein the leprosy is, and he shall shut it up other seven days.
sentences.chinese: 司祭當吩咐人將帶有斑痕的物品洗滌，再收藏七天。

sentences.english: Napoleon bade him ride at his side and began questioning him.
sentences.chinese: 拿破崙吩咐他和自己並轡而行開始問他。

sentences.english: The leaf is total, so late, have what order?
sentences.chinese: 葉總，這麼晚了，有什麼吩咐？

sentences.english: These things I command you, that ye love one another.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣吩咐你們，是要叫你們彼此相愛。

sentences.english: And thou shalt set upon the table loaves of proposition in my sight always.
sentences.chinese: 在桌上於上主前擺上供餅，如上主吩咐梅瑟的。

definition: to retire/to withdraw/to retreat/to step down
to follow your orders/to do as you bid
to report back to one's superior
to promise/to agree to do sth
